text: Ni twatesile ŵandu aŵala ŵaŵaliji nkuonedwa mpela ŵangalikombolela (ligongo lya ukapolo ŵali ŵanache ŵa Israila) kuŵa ŵawinjila kungopoko kwa chilambo (cha Shami) ni kungapililo kwakwe akula kwatwatasileko upile, ni lyakalulile liloŵe lya Ambuje ŵenu lyalili lyambone kwa ŵanache ŵa Israila ligongo lya kupilila kwao, soni ni twagajonasile masengo gaŵaliji nkupanganya Firiauna ni ŵandu ŵakwe (mpela ga unamalima) kwisa soni majumba gaŵaliji nkwimika njo
